documents.summary: Standard template for GitHub Pull Requests, ensuring consistent reporting of summaries, details, related issues, validation steps, and pre-merge checklists.

documents.title: Frequently Asked Questions

documents.title: Documentation Index
documents.summary: The central landing page for all Gemini CLI documentation, providing links to quickstart guides, tutorials, feature references, and technical topics.

documents.title: Integration Testing Framework
documents.summary: Detailed overview of the integration testing setup for Gemini CLI, including instructions for running, building, and debugging end-to-end tests.

documents.summary: Description of the automated workflows (Gemini-based triage, CI checks, PR auditing) used to manage and integrate community contributions efficiently.

documents.summary: Detailed breakdown of the free usage limits and paid tier options for Gemini CLI, based on authentication methods like Google login, API keys, or Vertex AI.

documents.summary: Overview of the quality gates and verification steps (automated tests, manual dogfooding, telemetry review) required before promoting a Gemini CLI release to stable.

documents.summary: Detailed explanation of the Gemini CLI release cadence (nightly, preview, stable), environment differences (dev vs prod), and automated promotion workflows.

documents.summary: Solutions for common issues like authentication errors, environment variable misconfigurations, and platform-specific bugs, along with debugging tips for CLI and Core.

documents.summary: Documentation for organization admins to manage and enforce security policies (MCP allowlisting, extensions, skills) globally for enterprise users.

documents.summary: A central archive of major release announcements for Gemini CLI, covering key features and improvements introduced in each version.

documents.summary: Quick reference for commonly used commands, options, model aliases, and management flags for extensions, MCP servers, and skills.

documents.summary: Main index for CLI-specific documentation, linking to user guides, slash command references, configuration options, and technical features.

documents.summary: List of all default keyboard shortcuts for Gemini CLI, covering cursor movement, editing, scrolling, history search, and application controls.

title: Gemini CLI Technical Documentation
summary: Comprehensive technical documentation for Gemini CLI, an open-source AI agent for the terminal. This knowledge base covers core architecture, configuration guides, command references, Agent Skills, extension development, security policies, and automation tutorials.
